abilities.name: Emitter
abilities.description: Create an energy shield around yourself for 3.5s, absorbing 1500 damage.

abilities.name: Hexa Fire
abilities.description: Ruckus roots himself in place and reveals four extra guns: two additional miniguns and two rocket launchers. All six guns fire simultaneously for 5s

abilities.name: Hover
abilities.description: Hovers for 2.5 seconds. Removes all debuffs on use.

abilities.name: Minigun
abilities.description: An incredibly fast firing minigun with medium range.
